text: László Aradszky (20 September 1935 – 8 October 2017) was a Hungarian pop singer. He became successful in the 1960s after participation in the talent show Táncdalfesztivál. He was born in Budapest, Hungary. Aradszky died in Budapest on 8 October 2017 at the age of 82. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1935 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Pop singers Category:Musicians from Budapest Category:Hungarian singers
title: László Aradszky
